entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 1:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: SSE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level near valley bottom. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
